item.title: Trump's Birthright Citizenship Order Faces Likely Rejection In Second Federal Appeals Court: Report
item.description: A second federal appeals court believes Trump's order limiting birthright citizenship may be unconstitutional. read more

item.title: Trump-Backed Spending Bill Forces CPB Shutdown After 60 Years of Public Broadcasting
item.description: The Corporation for Public Broadcasting will close after Congress cut $1.1 billion in funding. CPB will shut down by Sept. 30. read more

item.title: Epstein Associate Ghislaine Maxwell Moved To Lower-Security Texas Prison After DOJ Interview: Report
item.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was moved to a Texas prison after a DOJ interview led by Trump's former lawyer amid pressure to release Epstein files. read more

item.title: Trump Fires Bureau Of Labor Statistics Chief Erika McEntarfer After Weak Jobs Report: 'Directed My Team To Fire This Biden Political Appointee'
item.description: President Donald Trump fired Bureau of Labor Statistics chief Erika McEntarfer after a weak July jobs report. read more

item.title: Tim Cook Says 'Apple Must Do This,' As He Compares AI To Internet, Smartphone Revolutions
item.description: Tim Cook emphasized the importance of AI during an all-hands meeting after strong earnings, signaling a strategic shift for the tech giant. read more
